ygData.subject: Re: Mining company?
ygData.msgSnippet: If it is for the DF armor, then its Melatite. The vendor doesnt sell it by default, only if someone happens to sell it to him first. And unless you killed many
ygData.messageBody:
If it is for the DF armor, then its Melatite.
The vendor doesnt sell it by default, only if someone
happens to sell it to him first. And unless you killed
many Greater Kobolds, you will be KoS to the gnomes in
there.
So get ready to kill many clockworks. I have heard its
a rare drop off random works down there.One SK we know
killed them for 5 hours and got only one piece of
Melatite.


GL

--- "Steven E. Phipps" <phipps@...> wrote:

<DIV><FONT face=Arial size=2>I need to go to the
Mining co. in solusek a to get
some deufrite or something like that. (cant remember
exact name, am at work). Do
I buy this? If  so, who is gonna sell it to an
ogre SK? I am wondering
about this part of the quest, anyone who has info to
share on how to obtain this
quest item please let me know. I have never walked in
this dungeon, and dont see
my ogre strolling through gnome time asking for
it..</FONT></DIV>
<DIV><FONT face=Arial size=2>If i do not buy it, who
do i kill to get it? I am
level 30 btw..</FONT></DIV>
